availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, policeman. Mississippi native. Married to Eliza Ellen Manike Cochran in Jefferson County on October 28, 1860. Father of Ida E. Cochran. Policeman in Louisville in 1864. Attended a meeting of Southern sympathizers at the Louisville Courthouse in March 1861.

ab.bibl:
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 4, page 403B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, 1860-61, Film #000819613, p. 29 of 413.
The Louisville Daily Courier, "Meeting at the Court House," March 15, 1861, page 1.
